account_id.description: The ID of your Nexmo account. This is the same as your API key.

etag.description: An identifier for the content. This will change if the content of the file has been changed (i.e. if you upload a new version of the file). For more information see Wikipedia: [HTTP ETag](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTTP_ETag)

max_downloads_allowed.description: The maximum number of times the file may be downloaded.

media_size.description: The size of the file in bytes

metadata_primary.description: A user set string containing metadata about the media file.

metadata_secondary.description: A user set string containing further metadata about the media file.

mime_type.description: The IETF MIME type of the file.

original_file_name.description: The filename of the object as it was originally uploaded.

public.description: Whether the item is available for download without authentication.

store_id.description: An internal identifier of how the file is stored.

time_created.description: A timestamp for the time that the file was created

time_last_updated.description: A timestamp for the time that the file was last modified

times_downloaded.description: The number of times the file has been downloaded.
